titleStmt.title: A proclamation for a generall fast throughout this realme of England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-Hall, the thirtieth day of Iune, in the second yeere of His Maiesties reigne ..
This state has arms 21 (with "C R" at top); Steele notation: of rect 2) inclina- iustly.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
